org.nd4j.linalg.api.ops.impl.transforms

Class LeakyReLU

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nd4j.linalg.api.ops.BaseOp
      • org.nd4j.linalg.api.ops.BaseTransformOp
        • org.nd4j.linalg.api.ops.impl.transforms.LeakyReLU
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Op, TransformOp

    public class LeakyReLU
extends BaseTransformOp
    Leaky Rectified linear unit. Default alpha=0.01, cutoff=0
    Out(x) = alpha*x if x<0
    Out(x) = x if x >= 0
    Leaky ReLU may avoid zero gradient "dying ReLU" problem by having non-zero gradient below 0.
    See for example http://arxiv.org/abs/1505.00853 for a comparison of ReLU variants.
